### Contact Us

We are a new and growing research centre and are actively seeking

- data partners
- research funding
- research assistants, postgraduate students, and postdocs

If you or your organisation would like to work with us, please get in touch. Research students at Stellenbosch University who are interested in household finance should email us to set up a meeting.
